O que falar desse jogo que mal joguei e já considero pacas? Portal 2 só não é perfeito por que a história tem fim. É um jogo considerávelmente curto, que te involve profundamente com a história, com partes difíceis e easter eggs, um coop divertido que requer muito trabalho de equipe, simplesmente incrível! Com as câmaras da oficina a diversão pode continuar além do jogo, tanto solo quanto com um amigo! 
 Trilha sonora 10/10
 História 10/10
 Jogabilidade e envolvimento 10/10

Truly one of the best games on steam and in my library. The first portal was awesome and had a great story line that went well with the gameplay and mixed with the dark humour tied it all together into a big knot of amazing gameness. I was't quite sure what they could do with the story so was a little leery of basically a remake for a sequel. But this game took all the doubts I had and shoved them right up Wheatley's @#$. This game is near perfect. An improvement on the first and looks great. Plays great. And best of all the puzzles dont get boring. Later on they get harder and harder and sometimes, after a considerable amount of screaming, you have to just take a break from a level, come back later, see your dumb mistake, hit your head against a wall, and continue into the wonderful brain melting delight that is Portal 2. A must play for any Portal 1 lover or gamer in general. Fingers crossed for Portal 3. PLEASE VALVE PLEASE!
Used my brain more than my portal gun.
Good in co op. Good price at £3.74. Definitely buy this in the sales if you have a friend to play with.

Por solo 3,75 usd en rebaja (O inclusive menos) este juego se transformó en uno de mis favoritos.
Una campaña super entretenida, con puzzles que te harán pensar y hacerte dar vueltas por el nivel una y otra vez hasta que te des cuenta que hacer. Uno de los mejores antagonistas en los videojuegos, GLaDOS. Y con un cooperativo muy divertido si es con el amigo adecuado.
Totalmente recomendado, al día de hoy es pecado no tener este juego en tu biblioteca y haberlo jugado.
Simplismente incrivel

Just as good as the original, though this one feels like it is a bit easier then the original considering I blew through half the game in one night. Either way it's worth playing.

Sorry for my poor English ,This game is Really Much BETTER than Portal 1,The drama of the story mode is really moved me a lot.Especially the ending,The ending of this game do not counting on a happy ending,GLaDOS feels not a enemy,almost like a friend,Falling apart ending is really make me sad...

通关了一代之后又迫不及待的通关了这一代，仅仅是为了看剧情，游戏整体感觉比前作简直是天翻地覆，特别是剧情，和GLaDOS的关系就像朋友一样，结尾的一句“把你删除说不定我会好受一些”已经让我忘记了之前她作为人工智能的冷酷了，说实话，还是有点舍不得她和玩家分开呢。
由于接触的时间不长，如果本人有对剧情的误解欢迎指出，不过真的很喜欢GLaDOS，非常有特点的一个角色。
（单说片尾曲，还是一代的好听）

Portal is a masterpiece to me. The first one was pretty good, even though it was more a concept than anything, yet the Portal universe was so interesting. Portal 2 is now giving a lot, lot more of information and details about Aperture Science, the history of the company, Chell etc.. and this is really interesting! The game let you discover a lot more about how all these tests work, you're finally seeing the machine (well, beside GLaDOS of course).

The gameplay is the same as the first one portalgun-wise, but introduces a bunch of new mechanics. Turrets, our lovely turrets, are also back into the party. Puzzles are really cleverly-made, nothing is too difficult if you concentrate enough, though I felt I kinda cheated one or two rooms and somehow made it to the exit, without trying to.

This is of course a must-buy, it goes on sale regularly but is totally worth the full price. Not to mention the addition of a CO-OP mode with our two new friends Atlas and P-Body, each one of them controlled by you and one of your friend! Try to cooperate.. or mess around with your friend!
good
Good game, but was refused cake. :( 9/10

i reccomend this game 100 percent. there many upsides to this game so ill tell you them

number 1: the story mode: the story mode is unforgettable and epic with unexpected turns in  the plot theres even a huge unexpected plot twist halfway through the game that no one would see coming and the endeng is one of the best i have ever seen in a video game

number 2: multiplayer: even when you finish the singleplayer mode theres a co-op mode that you can play with your friends which is loads of fun. you can also download custom levels either 2 player or 1 player so this game can last a very long time.

number 3: the game engine: the game runs shockingly smooth even on slow computers. i have a laptop that can bareley handle minecraft over 30fps with optifine and this game is the smoothest game i have on my laptop and bileve me its so slow some games arent even playable.

so yeah this game is great its definitley worth the 21 dollars (even though i got it for a quarter of the price on a specail event) and i totally reccomend it its an awesome experience that any gamer thould try and enjoy i hope everyone gets as much fun out of it as i did!

I received this game for free by pre-ordering the steam controller. I saw some reviews about it being pretty good and they were right. I just blew $60 bucks on fallout 4 and haven't had near the fun in that game as I have had in this one....  granted these two games are nothing alike. 

Your goal is to basically complete all these tests that this super computer has laid out for you. She is bitter that you tried to kill her previously (maybe in portal...dont know havent played it yet) and she wants you to die, basically.
I loved the wittiness and the way she taunts you throughout the game. It really makes you want to overheat her core! You are given a portal gun that enters/exits and left to decide what to do to reach the exits in each board. Seems simple enough but might find yourself scratching your head like I did a few times. Took about 5 days to beat this game, playing for several hours in the evenings and a full day. Roughly 20 some hours.

Graphics are great for a game several years old and the gameplay was smooth. I recommend this game to anyone that wants to take a break from the same ol first person shooters and get immersed into a first person puzzle game.

OMG 4 WORDS:
THIS GAME IS HARD.
END OF REVIEW.

The puzzles are soooo difficult and the setting is great... it really expands on the backstory and blah blah blah.
Just play it and it will hook you to your computer...
Worth the price...
End of review.

Also, don't forget to find friends to play the co-op mode!

Go buy it, play it. Enjoy the good time!

В общем, если вы еще не играете в Portal 2, то вы очень многое упускаете.

[h1]个人评价[/h1]
[list]
[*][h1]剧情：10/10[/h1]
剧情与操作相互陪衬，都是传送门这款游戏的亮点。
[*][h1]画面：9/10[/h1]
传送门系列所使用的起源引擎只需要不高的配置就能运行。尽管画面在具体的纹理上略有欠缺，但总体来说画面还是在可以接受的范围内。
[*][h1]游戏性：10/10[/h1]
不错的剧情。玩完了单人还有互坑的双人以及创意工坊中的内容，总体来说游戏性较高。
[/list]
[code][h1][b]总分：10/10[/b][/h1]
Steam入坑作![/code]

Что можно сказать об этой игре? Лучшая головоломка с мультиплеером и сюжетом и даже некоторыми БОЛЬШИМИ пасхалками.
Плюсы:
+ Мультиплеер
+ Атмосфера (которая придает этой игре музыка и окружение)
+ Отличный сюжет
+ Достижения (которые могут продлить удовольствие от игры)
+ Мастерская (много отличных и трудных карт)
+ Способность создать свою карту
+ Пасхалки из которых можно найти скрытный сюжет
Минусы:
-Быстропроходимые уровни в одиночной и кооперативной игре
-Дорогая игра (кому как, а мне дорого)
-Покупаемые вещи внутри игры
Вообщем игре оценка 89/100 Стоит поиграть тем кто хочет узнать о доверии побольше!!!
It is a good game
zajebista gra nie gadac kupowac
从基佬到百合，从闺蜜到女友。这是追妹子，培养感情，谈恋爱的必备双人游戏。游戏需要两人之前的互动，默契，还有不少肢体接触。。。良心游戏，良心价格。

《传送门2》是Valve Software公司在2011年以Source引擎制作的FPS游戏，是经典第一人称解密游戏《传送门》的续作。游戏中剧情紧接前作，主角雪儿(Chell)将会在光圈科技的实验室中使用“传送门”进行一场新的冒险。新的剧情揭示了“光圈科技”的前身“光圈科学先驱者公司”和“光圈公司”这两个时代。其中添加多种道具以及全新的环境。

《传送门》拥有让人惊喜的新元素。第一人称物理解谜风格的游戏方式别具匠心。杀人机器恶棍AI GLaDOS有新意而充满生气，它邪恶而又非常迷人。前作短小精悍。创造一部有新意又流程更长的续作不是件容易的事。但这显然难不倒Valve。

从你在Aperture Science醒来的那一刻直到制作人名单出现，《传送门2》表现始终如一地出色。世界更大、故事更丰富，角色发展更让人惊讶。Aperture Science的控制者GLaDOS被打造成多种预料不到的形式，被赋予了很搞笑的性格。当你不是盯着屏幕皱着眉冥思苦想谜题时，《传送门2》一般都会让你大笑。
No i have been screwed over and screwed out of my money. i payed for a full game, not some shit that skips every five seconds on my computer. I better get a freaking refund for this.
My throat hurts so bad from laughing so much. My friend and I spent more time dinking around and having fun that actually doing the missions. A must play for a couple of friends.

Una obra maestra como su antecesor, da para buen rato de juego y ese Cave Johnson, Wheatley y la Gladotato le agregan ese toque para hacerte reír (contrario a Portal que mantenia la trama un poco turbia).

A diferencia de Portal, Portal 2 presenta mayor rejugabilidad gracias a su modo multijugador, desafíos y si eres de esos con creatividad, puedes crear tus propios escenarios para que otros jugadores los intenten pasar.

What is Portal 2? 
Portal 2 is an improved Portal 1, with new graphics, about 4 times more hours of singleplayer campaign, new graphics (HL2EP2 engine), tons of fun, tons of game backstory, tons of clever puzzles. 
I love every aspect of this game, from 'playing smooth jazz to relax' to the more dark parts of the game.

SPOILERS: You can find a Half Life 2 EP 2 story linking point, hidden in one level.

10/10, no cons at all.
呃。。。为什么我的游戏固定每隔几秒卡一下？不只是在游戏里，停在主菜单页面也会几秒一卡。。。视频选项分辨率也一样。。明明玩csgo无压力的啊。。。不一个引擎做的吗。。。

La verdad es que es una obra maestra de Valve que todo el mundo deberia de jugar, oviamente nunca sin haber jugado Portal 1 previamente(IMPORTANTE), graficamente muy bien y con unas fisicas muy buenas, el genero puzzle es impresionante cuando se lleva al nivel de este juego y a esto me refiero con que TODO el mundo que se considere"gamer/friki/jugon"(como lo querais llamar) o que aun que no se lo considere pero quiera entrar en el mundillo deberia de jugar. La trama es un clasico donde intentas escapar de un laboratorio controlado por "una robot metida en LSD" con la ayuda de una pistola que te permite conectar dos portales, con esa sencillez mezcla el humor con la estrategia y las emociones. no te defraudara, la "campaña" es de unas 25-30 horas(que por el precio que tiene es increible) y cuando te canses tienes las camaras de la comunidad y el cooperativo, que dan para otras 450 horas mas.
ᅠ
结尾大赞，这是唯一一个让我看完制作组名单的游戏！！

Sumandole unos muy buenos graficos y la traducción de dialogos en varios idiomas (aunque prefiero en ingles con las voces originales). Este es un juego que no puede faltar en tu biblioteca. De mis juegos favoritos. No se arrepentiran de comprarlo
